001.name: CrewOne
001.text: The Commander wants me to fix the thrusters?

002.name: CrewOne
002.text: It will take a bit of time to finish.

003.name: CrewOne
003.text: I will also need your help to finish it.

004.name: CrewOne
004.text: Here are the things that you need to solve.

005.name: CrewOne
005.text: Do them on the workbench over there.

006.name: CrewOne
006.text: Here’s also an addition to your database in case you don’t know something.
